scripts.test: yarn lint && yarn secure && yarn spec
scripts.coverage: nyc --reporter html mocha --bail test/*.test.js && open coverage/index.html
scripts.perf:baseline: node test/performance.js & sleep 2 && artillery quick -d 10 -r 1000 -o /dev/null -k http://localhost:8000
scripts.perf:stoppable: node test/performance.js 1 & sleep 2 && artillery quick -d 10 -r 1000 -o /dev/null -k http://localhost:8000
